entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections this afternoon. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 1 May 2023
